title: Rebecca
author: daphne-du-maurier
summary: A young bride arrives at her husband's estate Manderley, only to find herself haunted by the presence of his first wife, Rebecca. Won the National Book Award and was adapted into Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning 1940 film.
